queries.name: q_host_status_check
queries.sql: select HOST as hostname, HOST_STATUS as status from M_landscape_host_configuration where HOST_STATUS = 'ERROR'

recommendations.name: Host Status
recommendations.description: Check the status of each host in the SAP HANA environment to see if they are online and working

actions.description:
Not all hosts are in a healthy state. Check that all hosts are online with their services started. 
The following hosts are in an error state: ${q_host_status_check}
